TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IApplicationPreloadManager

Docs.summary: Provides methods that ASP.NET uses to invoke the application-preload feature in IIS 7.0.

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetApplicationPreloadState (string context, string appId, bool enabled);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void SetApplicationPreloadState([in]string context, [in]string appId, [in]bool enabled) cil managed

public: void SetApplicationPreloadState(System::String ^ context, System::String ^ appId, bool enabled);
abstract member SetApplicationPreloadState : string * string * bool -> unit

Docs.param: The unique ID of the application.
to indicate that the application should be preloaded; otherwise, .
Docs.summary: Called by [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)] to notify ASP.NET whether an application should be preloaded.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void SetApplicationPreloadUtil([in]class System.Web.Hosting.IApplicationPreloadUtil preloadUtil) cil managed

Docs.param: The handle to an unmanaged interface in [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)] that ASP.NET calls to get information.
Docs.summary: Calls [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)] to get information that is required in order to preload an application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks IIS calls ASP.NET through this interface, supplying a reference to an object that implements the <xref:System.Web.Hosting.IApplicationPreloadUtil> interface. ASP.NET uses that interface later to perform a callback into IIS to get preload information for individual applications.
